alert.note: Alert for Marion; Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 7:39PM CST until February 17 at 4:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Wintry Conditions For Southeast Iowa Tonight into Thursday... .Light rain in portions of central and southeast Iowa is expected to transition to freezing rain and sleet tonight. Light accumulations of ice are expected, especially on bridges and overpasses producing hazardous travel. Some break in the precipitation is expected late tonight with light snow moving back into the area on Thursday with light accumulations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of up to a couple hundredths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southern and central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions if traveling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.
